user_instruction: 'Send an email to Vitality Partners to update them on our HealthHub requirements. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Updated HealthHub Requirements – Review & Next Steps  

Dear Vitality Partners Team,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m writing to share OptiLife’s latest updates to the HealthHub requirements and to ask for your feedback.

Where to find the details  
• Notion: HealthHub Project → “Requirements v2.1” (all changes highlighted)  
• Gmail thread: “HealthHub – Latest Scope” dated 14 June (contains context and previous Q&A)

Key updates at a glance  
1. Okta SSO integration for all OptiLife employees  
2. New “Monthly Mindfulness” challenge template  
3. HIPAA-compliant real-time analytics dashboard  
4. Mobile push-notification capability for challenges  
5. Target go-live date moved to 15 September

Action requested  
• Review the updated requirements document.  
• Flag any questions, risks, or resource concerns.  
• Provide an updated implementation timeline and cost estimate by COB Friday, 21 June.  
• If helpful, feel free to book a quick call via my calendar (link in signature).

Please let me know if anything in the documents is unclear or if you need additional information.

Thank you for your continued partnership on HealthHub.

Best regards,

Jane Doe  
Health Program Coordinator, OptiLife Inc.  
jane.doe@optilife.com | (555) 123-4567
